alert.note: Alert for Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 6:15AM CDT until June 19 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... West central Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... Quitman County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 800 AM EDT/700 AM CDT/. * At 715 AM EDT/615 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Georgetown to near Fort Gaines to near Headland, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Morgan, Georgetown, Blakely, Dawson, Cuthbert, Edison, Arlington, Webb, Shellman, Columbia, Leary, Douglasville, Centerville, Damascus, Bronwood, Parrott, Bellville and Haleburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
